data.description: Object Oriented Perl for User Dialogs
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module name was decided upon with the help of the Perl
    module-authors mailing list. The thread starts here:

    http://www.mail-archive.com/module-authors@perl.org/msg00666.html

    and the final descision was made here:

    http://www.mail-archive.com/module-authors@perl.org/msg00686.html

    followed by a few positive responses and no negatives.
